snippet.title: Man suffers serious burns as out-of-control inferno envelops Sydney building
snippet.content: A man is being treated for serious burns as firefighters battle an enormous inferno which has erupted at a building in Sydney's west. The factory on Links Road at St Marys housed aerosol cans which have exploded, sending the fire out of control. Multiple fire crews are at the site trying to bring to contain the fire. A man in his 40s is being treated by paramedics after receiving burns to 60 percent of his body. Aerial shots of the fire show large flames ravaging the building and plumes of black smoke rising into the air. The cause of the fire is unknown. (C) Nine Digital Pty Ltd 2017
